website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive little cash box that serves as an efficient way to organize smaller amounts of money.
pros: Has 2 areas for larger bills and checks
Includes 6 compartments for keeping change organized
2 keys come with the cash box
Serves its purpose well at a low cost
Small handle on top for carrying
Keys for multiple boxes will NOT be keyed the same
cons: Lid does not latch completely unless it is locked and could come open in transport

customer_reviews.title: This lock box can be easily opened without the key or any tools
customer_reviews.text: This lock box can be easily opened without the key or any tools. The lock is so inadequate that the box frequently opens by itself when being carried by the handle, dumping the contents. While the listing contains a link to the Sentry Group warranty, the warranty excludes this product along with all "Cash and Key boxes".
customer_reviews.author: Dink SInger

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed that both boxes have the same key
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these lock boxes to be used for the same venue, different accounts. Very disappointed that both boxes have the same key. Therefore, you can open all purchased boxes with the same key. That doesn't make a whole lot of sense.
customer_reviews.author: S Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Great Medication Lock Box - Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: Although I wasn't sure the box would be the right size for my needs (medication lock box), I was pleased with the price and took a chance. The awesome news is - it is EXACTLY the right size! I LOVE when that happens! Score!
customer_reviews.author: Toni M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I store my documents in here and sentimental things I don't want people to take from me. The case is exactly what I needed in my family of 6. I would NOT recommend storing a weapon or anything flammable. I took the money holder out and I am able to fit more. The case comes with two keys. I recommend having one on your keychain and one in a place that is inconspicuous. If you're looking for something to store your drugs in, this is not smell-proof.
customer_reviews.author: Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Now the key that came with this didn't fit in the lock so I had it rekeyed by a local locksmith and it works great. Good size for multiple things and much larger than I expected. It also can be tucked away in a drawer or under the bed to hide those "private items" or to as a way to keep your jewlery out of the open. It can be picked up so therefore a thief could just steal the whole safe so I wouldn't recommend using it as a permanent option or to hold large amounts of cash but as storage for personal non valuable items its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Better As A Till; Overall Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic safe. I use this as a till for my other safe (that box-shaped standard safe). It’s just like at work. I put cash in here and use it as a drawer. Then make my deposits every once in a while. If you’re looking for a safe that no one but yourself can absolutely get into, I wouldn’t say this is it because I don’t feel it’s very very secure. This is better as a till drawer that has a basic lock than an actual safe. The two keys are small, so I recommend putting it in a secure spot where you won’t forget or lose it. Good product, though!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Best for a Low Budget...
customer_reviews.text: If you need a lockable cash box and you're buying one on a low budget, this works well. It does what you need, keeps the box locked...most of the time. My biggest gripe would be that if the key is left in the lock, it can easily jiggle and unlock itself. Also, if you do not quite have the mechanism lined up right, you will think you have it locked, but SURPRISE you picked it up and now all your cash is laying on the ground! If you have the revenue, muster up the extra money, for a box that has the appropriate cash dividers & hinge designs to keep your money better organized and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amberracuda

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely sturdy, and works great for events. A few negatives: •theres only 2 cash sections. Generally, you'd probably want at least 3 for different types of bills. You can put things in the space underneath but I would have definitely preferred a third cash section. •there is not latch, so either you lock it closed or it will open easily •there is enough space in the top that if you put coins or cash they'll slide everywhere when the box is tilted. That's probably a normal fact for cash boxes but I thought I'd add it in. However, it's sturdy and does the job for a really great price.
customer_reviews.author: Khan_Family

customer_reviews.title: Lock sticks and wont open!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a great locking box for my medicine and valuables considering its brand name but boy was I wrong. The lock got stuck in the locking position and would never work again. I had to shake and shake the box until the lock hook slipped out of the hole it latches on and I was able to open it. This coulda caused a BAD n life threatening medical emergency! They need to work on this box more id say.
customer_reviews.author: misty sutton

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much as this is a cheap lock box but it failed to meet even my low expectations. The lock is very difficult to actually lock, the tray sits on top of it but not flush so with the lid closed it blocks the latch. I have to jiggle it every time I close the box. Twice in two days of using it I have tried to carry it by the handle, after making sure it was latched and locked all the way and twice the box popped open and spilled cash and coins all over the floor. I guess I can still use it if I carry it flat carefully but what a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Sido

customer_reviews.title: Love the SentrySafe Cash Box
customer_reviews.text: I was having a garage sale and needed a cash box. I decided to buy this one not only for the garage sale but later to keep important items and papers inside. In case of any emergency I can grab this box. Anyhow, it was perfect for the garage sale. I put $20+ dollars under the tray and the bill and coin drawer held the rest of the money with no problems. I really like my SentrySafe Cash Box, I took the tray out, and it now holds important papers. It is perfect for my needs. Plus, should I ever need a Cash Box I have one. Yea!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I'd consult with a professional dealer as consumer grade stuff is very easy for semi skilled burglars to crack
customer_reviews.text: I'm not expecting high security as I keep the cash box itself is in a fairly secure location, but I do want to organize my pocket change, passport, keys and various other important items. This works well to hold a stack of small bills, and coins in individual slots. If fire protection or security were important aims, I'd consult with a professional dealer as consumer grade stuff is very easy for semi skilled burglars to crack.
customer_reviews.author: Woodland Dan

customer_reviews.title: Thankful to have a lockbox that works!
customer_reviews.text: I am unsure why people would NOT give this 5 stars; it is sturdy, with a "fake" bottom and large enough to fit passport, extra cash, stock paperwork, and anything else private/you want to keep safe. The box comes with two keys, so if you lose one, there's a backup. After reading other reviews, I was wondering how someone would lock this and not be able to re-open it; well, if you don't put in the "fake" bottom, I guess you could mess up the lock?! But it would be quite difficult. This box is easy to use, easy to store things, and safe for you to keep your things in. End of story. Great product :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Box does not latch without key-Box broke already within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box for our school concessions sales. The tray is great but the box is a disaster as it does not close unless you remove the key. It is very hard to keep track of keys all the time and it should have a latch as well. Actually, the key we had actually broke and is now lodged within the socket. Do not buy this box if you wish to use for PTO purposes. It is a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Deepasriya Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy With This Product
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be great seeing how SentrySafe is a good brand but so not the case, I will be using this a lot for fundraisers and the first time I used it I was carrying into the house (by the handle) and it opened up, yes, I had it locked. Thankfully I was in my garage and the money and coins spilled out onto the garage floor, I go to different places for fundraisers and I can't use this because I shouldn't have to hold it in my arms instead of by the handle. I will be looking for a different safe.
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: No latch to keep box closed.
customer_reviews.text: The box must be locked with the key in order to handle it, otherwise it will open when you try to lift by the handle. There is no latch to keep it closed. It's just not practical to lock it and remove key each time I simply want to carry the box or move it a short distance. I would give it 4 stars if it snapped closed because I like the layout of the removable tray and size. I will return this box for one that is more practical.
customer_reviews.author: Weezy44

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, just one error.
customer_reviews.text: Nice box and all. BUT.... when I opened it I realized that it was already broke and the outline that the locking mechanism goes through is running against the plastic causing friction, which then causes it to be harder to lock. When going to lock it the messed up edge causes the metal to hit it and doesn’t let it finish it’s full rotation so it doesn’t release the key.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great for medication
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lock box for my medication. I occasionally have young ones around my home and I don't want any accidents so I decided to lock medications away from tiny hands that don't understand the danger. This box is large and sturdy. It locks and unlocks smoothly and has a nice handle. I was amazed how inexpensive this lock box was. It's not too heavy but heavy enough for the purpose I needed it for. For me this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so upset with this box because the key got ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so upset with this box because the key got stuck and broke as soon as I was trying to unlock it!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Concession stand cash box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SentrySafe CB-12 Cash Box for my school’s concession stand. We have an older one of the exact style and it worked well. I like that it has two slots for the dollar bills. It makes it easy to retrieve money. The space underneath the drawer is good for stashing larger bills. Overall a sturdy cash box at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Abb

customer_reviews.title: Ok for fundraising events bad for safekeepings
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect cash box for small events or like a pep rally fundraiser type program but it is not really useful for a more serious purpose. The box is rather shallow so not much space below the cash cover and not shock proof. The lock can be opened with a basic screwdriver in under 10 seconds. So this safe pretty useless for any kind of real safekeeping.
customer_reviews.author: Yoo R. Amayzin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our internally-run work snack bar. Exactly what's advertised. Perfectly sized, and the upper storage piece comes out for convenient reachability. Was able to fit a ton of empty coin rolls in the bottom section for future use, as well as several full coin rolls. Got lots of compliments for replacing the old piggy bank-style can with this. Definitely much more efficient and easily manageable, not to mention professional-looking. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great cash box
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this thinking you're getting a fire safe, or something like that. It's a cash box, and for what it is it's great. Quality seems spot-on and I'm very, very pleased with it. Especially at this price point. If you need something that's more heavy-duty, buy that and don't disappoint yourself. In my application, I wanted to organize and (reasonably) secure some semi-valuable items and for that application this little box shines. Size is great...not too big, but not small. Side note: If, like me, you want to use the box to full capacity and don't really care about the tray, you can repurpose it as a drawer organizer!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, stores plenty of change, as bonus fits 8 1/2 x 11 paper in lower compartment! (Not fireproof)
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packed well and item is as described. We are using it as a small “family bank” with our kids as we teach them about finances using the Dave Ramsey teaching tools. We now are able to keep plenty of change at hand and can fit our printed “family bank” statement in the compartment underneath. Fits 8 1/2 x 11 paper just fine. The height also allows it to perfectly fit in a small desk drawer. Lightweight (not heavy nor fireproof). Brings two keys. Wonder teaching and organizational tool for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Our Happy Little Tribe

customer_reviews.title: Nice box
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, quality box for the price. The lock works well and feels secure, the finish is scratch resistant and non-reflective. It is kind of small and the plastic tray takes up a good bit of the box's depth. Depending on how much cash you're dealing with, this box might not be big enough for some jobs. I suppose you could say that about any box, though.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Lock
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this safe for jewelry or money as I think those types of possessions need to be in a more secure safe. This safe comes with a key and it's been useful for locking away passports or other not so valuable items. It's sturdy and slightly heavy. I surely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Damarise Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Lock Box
customer_reviews.text: This SentrySafe Lockbox is perfect. Of course, it is not a full blown safe so don't expect it to be bulletproof but it does what I need it to. Keep cash in under lock and key. If you want something that cannot be broken into very easily, then I would just invest in a safe.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnius

customer_reviews.title: Don't keep the key in the lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock does not always stay locked if I store the key in the lock, carrying it the lock came undone and it fell open all the money spilling into the snow. It has only happened twice though. It is quite sturdy and the tray is nice
customer_reviews.author: Dani May

customer_reviews.title: Good value.  Would recommend.  Sturdy and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Bought for grandchildren who like boxes with locks. Bought stick on decorations which brightened them up. Will use to teach grandchildren how to make change. Would be a 5 star if it could be carried by handle without being locked.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: As a PTO treasurer, I handle a lot of cash and checks for our events and membership drives. We bought 2 of these and also store petty cash locked up in one for emergencies. I like having a tray that lifts out easily to store checks underneath, with enough room for our PAID stamp and check endorsement stamp. My only wish is that there were more cash slots and less coin slots in the tray so I could divide the bills up in 20s, 10s, 5s and 1s, rather than just the two on there.
customer_reviews.author: twingletonmom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store cash safe box.
customer_reviews.text: Size is just right to store your cash into it and also good for credit cards underneath the mid section this way everything is in one place when I look for my cards or cash. It’s easy to lock it or unlock it. Store your box in a hidden area in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Pop

customer_reviews.title: SUITS MY NEETS
customer_reviews.text: This box arrived with a small crack in the cash drawer, but that does not affect anything. It just arrived yesterday and appears to be sturdy. it suits my needs and fits perfectly in the space on my desk. nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great cash box for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for petty cash at work. It works great for my purpose. I have never had it open when locked and I always carry it by the handle. I have never had the tray slide around or any issues closing the box. For the price this a great little cash box.
customer_reviews.author: VegasMom

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This cash box is reasonably priced and it will serve it's purpose of holding cash at our church's annual rummage sale. Made of sturdy enameled metal, this locking cash box has rounded corners that won't poke you, a carry handle, a removable top tray, and enough space in the bottom to hold coin rolls and larger bills out of sight and easy reach. Overall, this box is well constructed, and a good value for the price. It's perfect to meet our needs for the event, but I wouldn't suggest using it as a safe since it's not fireproof and the lock is easy to pick.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for office requirements
customer_reviews.text: Cash and valuable locked box, a bit more substantial then expected considering the price. Totally fulling our purpose, the locked steel container s ideal for office use. We haven't used the wall anchored attachment because it't security is confined to unexpected lifting by persons unknown, not for highly motivated stealing. Excellent seller as well/
customer_reviews.author: Republica Peruanu

customer_reviews.title: Good basic lock box
customer_reviews.text: It's a good value for what it is. Not fireproof and someone will still get in if they really want to, but great for yard sales and book events like I use it for. Easy to keep your money and associated selling items together and slow someone down from trying to steal from you.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Baird

customer_reviews.title: Okay - hard to close
customer_reviews.text: Okay Box, serves it's purpose. the top section hast o be just right for it to close. if you put too much of something in the bottom section, and the stop does not sit straight, the box will not close. it's a bit annoying to keep having to adjust it. we dont' use it often, and it servers it's intended purpose. overall good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Madam Zu Zu

customer_reviews.title: Light duty
customer_reviews.text: This box is lockable but only for honest people, or to slow down not so honest people. I wouldn't count on this box to protect anything if you are not there at the time to watch over it. Good for garage sales and the like. Not for protecting valuables when you are not home. Too easy to pry it open.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, recommended for casual use
customer_reviews.text: Needed to lock up my jewelry and cash for when we have 3rd parties in the house, just to keep my good jewelry out of harm's way. This light, easy to use box is not big but big enough to lock up small valuables when you are not wearing it but are concerned jewelry could "disappear." Great value, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nekko925

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little box.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to store his “valuables” and money in. He loves it! I like that it’s a keyed lock, nothing to malfunction! Sturdy little box made by a good company.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Traylor

customer_reviews.title: Sturdyier than expected cash box with nice storage
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy little cash box. Worked well for our Girl Scout Cookie Sale. I would have given it 5 stars if this cash box could clasp without being locked, but for the price I can't be terribly picky since we don't often need to carry it while unlocked for our purposes. The trays for money are nice and the space inside fits letter size paper unfolded which is great for tally sheets and booth control sheets. It has ample room for pens and pencils also as well as banded money or coins when the top compartments become too full for making change. I'm sure we will get many years of use out of this box.
customer_reviews.author: luxcursor

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a simple but well built petty cash box for the office. After reviewing several models we decided on the Sentry brand. The all metal construction and full length hinge are a plus and the keyed latch has worked well without issue for over six months. The compartmentalized, removal tray is rugged enough for daily use and leaves plenty of storage room below. I was so please with the product that I just purchased two more from Amazon for our other office locations. If you are looking for a light weight cash box to fit in any desk or file cabinet drawer, I would recommend you consider this Sentry cash box. Steve N.E. Oklahoma
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: This box is perfect for your coins and cash. It is very strong and sturdy. While the locking mechanism isn't going to keep out anyone who is determined to get your loot, it will stop the casual thief looking to make a quick score. Very nice indeed.
customer_reviews.author: President & CEO

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this item.
customer_reviews.text: Worse product ever. Second day at the ROT rally, the handle broke, key did not lock properly. Bills and coins fall all over the floor. You can imagine the scene. Everybody is chasing the money...
customer_reviews.author: jbn

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and durable The carry handle is well designed with curved edges to make it comfortable to hold The box is slimline but has plenty of interior space Top tray has space for bills and change . The tray is easy to remove to reveal storage for larger notes if required. Feel better at events when it's busy, when dealing with money now we use a cash box
customer_reviews.author: PRV31 LLC

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice insert tray for organizing money
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It has a nice insert tray for organizing money. Sometimes the lock mechanism/key gets stuck (really annoying!) and the safe doesn't seem too secure. I think someone could easily break into this. I got it to deter every-day sticker fingers type of people, and it's great for that. Just don't expect it to stop a hard-core thief.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great security for our classroom snack shack.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for any safekeeping of money for a fundraiser. I wouldn't purchase it for any large-scale event or business because the size is limited (only 2 slots for cash), but for our small classroom fundraiser it's perfect. I like that is has a key instead of a combination so the only people getting into the lockbox are those who possess the key...not anyone who has memorized a "code."
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I needed. Actually bigger than anticipated, but the top shelf has the 2 spaces for bills and/or checks with a few coin cups in the middle. The bottom is easily used to tuck in extra paperwork and money. Works great for garage sales and other fundraisers for church. The gauge of the metal is not as heavy as some would want, but it's a receptacle, not a real safe. Keys worked fine and did the job. Smart move that it has to be locked in order to pick it up by the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Marval

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: First off I don’t like the plastic tray. The lock is very cheap and you have to lock it to carry the box. Seriously poor design. Wouldn’t take much to make it worth the money b
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for Yard Sales and Flea markets
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take to a fund raising event. I would not ever use it to secure any thing for real. Someone could pry this right open, it is flimsy and the lock is like a little diary lock, but for what I needed it for, and for the price, i'd say it's perfect! Yard sales, flea markets, bake sales, any place you are exchanging money and dont want to go in and out of your purse while at the same time not FULLY trusting everyone around you. The lock does work, but if a person really wants to get in it ,they would be able to.
customer_reviews.author: Candace S.

customer_reviews.title: Used/Open Box in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great box, bought it as Amazon used/repackaged for a decent savings, and it looked brand new. I actually got it in anticipation of transporting MM legally in the car, locked box in the trunk, key on your person, etc., but thought perhaps it could do double duty as a cash box in a garage sale or something. Or maybe keeping family members out of your legally sanctioned medication. ;) I don't believe it's fireproof, so doesn't have much use past this kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Anja

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your needs
customer_reviews.text: Super basic and could definitely be opened if someone wanted to. That said I needed a simple deterrent for a few items as I have had a number of service workers in my home. So it worked for me but I wouldn’t recommend this for a work place that has a number of people who could access.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great but keep away from strong men.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until someone turned the key too hard and broke the key in the lock. Had to smack the lock in with a hammer to unhook it to retrieve the cash. A friend said he would fix it by getting a new lock. The one that broke it paid me back for the damage. :/
customer_reviews.author: AdaKahless

customer_reviews.title: Great for Garage Sale
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this worked great for our garage sale. My only main complaint was that the key wore out by day 2 and broke. I mean, honestly, if someone wanted to steal from us they could have just run off with the box so I knew I wasn't buying something to be very secure but I did like the ability to lock it after I went to put someone's cash in. The top tray was great for organizing the coins though, and the bottom was the right size to hold a few more sheets of price stickers, markers, tape, and higher bills.
customer_reviews.author: Junell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It was great, just ended up bringing back because I found a different one I liked more, but if I would have kept it was good quality & worked good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Larger than I expected, actually. I could have gone with the smaller size for what I needed (). Fits full envelopes in the bottom section, below the money tray.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent safe! Can be used for many different types of things! I bought 3 of this already and I'm very happy with it! Not to big and not to small! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: one day

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of garbage. It broke before I even got a chance to use it! So now it doesn't lock because the piece that secures it broke due to it being sooo very thin.
customer_reviews.author: JESS

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good deal and can hold a fair amount inside. The lock was easy. I was very pleased with the purchase. Great for keeping something private.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Moon

customer_reviews.title: Worked like expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great basic cash box. Used it for our personal business and it worked just as we expected. One thing to keep in mind is the coin spots will not keep them organized and they will end up all over the box. Might be worth finding a cash box that has a way to close the coin compartments to prevent sorting every use.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for handling small transactions such as at garage sales
customer_reviews.text: Bought for garage sale. Perfect for handling small transactions; lockable to help ensure contents do not get taken easily. Easily fits bills and coins. I bought a second for another friend who also does garage sales, and they are very pleased with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: LunaSea

customer_reviews.title: Probably wouldn't recommend this if you are even remotely worried about sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: I could pry this thing open in 10 seconds without a key if I had to. I seriously doubt that this would be fireproof if exposed to a house fire. The lid doesn't even fit that tight. I bought two boxes thinking they would come with different keys, but every box has the same key. Probably wouldn't recommend this if you are even remotely worried about sensitive documents or anything paper being caught in a house fire.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Good box for small business
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for. I set up a booth at flea markets and similar events. I have a square but a lot of customefs prefer to use cash. This is just what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Keysha Lewis Desilvey

customer_reviews.title: Great box, not so great cash tray.
customer_reviews.text: I run my own business and needed something heavy duty for vending shows. It's large enough that if anyone tried to snatched it, you'd clearly see it happen. It's very heavy duty and the keys work as you'd expect. Con: The tray itself isn't very strong, and after about a week of the part of the tray that rests on the locking mechanism cracked. I was able to tape it, but not sure how long that will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Chakayla Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Great Low-Level Security Safe
customer_reviews.text: This safe is an absolute steal for the price. It's worth every penny. That being said, don't even think about buying this safe if you need strong protection from burglars. A monkey could easily pick the lock with a paperclip, or just throw the safe at a rock and it'll crack right open. This is a great safe for carrying around money or keeping your money safe at a business while you're in the room watching it. It would make a great safe for children or just some small items that you want to keep private. But don't expect Fort Knox level security with this thing. It's cheap. But hey, that's all I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jake D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe to put some valuables I have. And I was very surprised on how sturdy it is! It locks perfectly and it is a perfect size to store in at any special hidden place. I definitely recommend! Worth the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Whatever this says it does, it does it perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, super sturdy, and does exactly what it says it does. It comes with a set of 2 keys, and has a removable tray that sits in the top of the box, with multiple compartments in the tray. The box itself has no compartments, which is perfect for dumping stuff into it under the tray itself. If I need another one of these, I would not think twice about repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Brah Dude

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay closed unless locked
customer_reviews.text: The box will not stay closed unless it is locked. Which is inconvenient if you don’t want to keep locking and unlocking in order to carry it from one place to another.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: I got the cash box very quickly and was amazed by the heavy duty construction of the box. I purchased this particular item because I liked the multiple spots for both coins and bills. There is also a large amount of space below the drawer for receipt books over overflow from the drawer. The only thing I don't like about the cash box is the fact that it only closes with the key, there is no normal latch on it. However it does mean that the box is always locked, and the lock is much more secure that those of most varieties.
customer_reviews.author: College Sweetie21

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: It opens while holding it from the top. :( not good for my business.
customer_reviews.author: leslie m.

customer_reviews.title: A Place for my things
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these boxes. one for the spouse and one for me. Able to place cc, cash, watch, rings, earrings, bracelets w/o any problems. Not meant to be FT KNOX but it keeps all in one place and can be slid under the bed or inside the safe when out of town.. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: John A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Couple of Issues
customer_reviews.text: I needed this money box for garage sale. I was disappointed in receiving it, a dent was on the side of it. I didn’t bother contacting company because I needed it the following day. The key does seem to jam from time to time. Everything else was fine. It served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy and nice-looking lock box. It would be hard to break into. I'd still keep it in a hidden place.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Love

customer_reviews.title: Could be better but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I rated it as 4 stars because the top coin sorter doesn't reach the top of the box, which means if the box tips, the coins spill all over. Once I figured that out and was more careful with it, it was better. Also wish it could be kept closed without having to lock it (if you don't lock it, the lid is not latched at all). Lots of room for bills, coins and my card readers (PayPal Here and/or Square) and the bottom part is roomy enough for pens, order forms, paper bags and a mini clipboard.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Cronck

customer_reviews.title: It was larger than what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: It is just as described. However I didn’t know at the time I would be toting this box often. No regrets on my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nubian Queen**

customer_reviews.title: Cash box
customer_reviews.text: Thiss box is very sturdy and locks great, however it was to heavy once funds are added to carry to and from events.
customer_reviews.author: Loreen Soto

customer_reviews.title: Decent sturdy little safe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, solid personal safe with a lock and two keys. The lock is not super high quality but you can't expect a more advanced locking mechanism for the price, it is acceptable and functional. I use it to store gift cards I've accrued, petty cash and change.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Keep cash at hand and securely locked
customer_reviews.text: I have this box to keep petty cash sorted and handy whenever I need it. It is sturdy and heavy so nit easy to break into and the lock keeps it properly shut. There is enough room under the main tray to store documents or anything of value.
customer_reviews.author: Y. C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality at a Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good for collecting the money at events like pancake breakfasts and admission at basketball ball games for school. I would get something more stationary and secure if I was using it for my business everyday
customer_reviews.author: Jojo22

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. Sturdy and has a little weight to it. Great to stash a couple items in and tuck away in your closet.
customer_reviews.author: firmit perez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use cash box
customer_reviews.text: Nice little lock box to stash your cash. It won't hold millions, but that definitely not my situation so it's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elocin Arevlis

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: One week before I bought this, I bought a First Alert safe for 79.00. I lost they key & had to break it open as my rent money was in it. My son had bought this one & showed it to me after I told him what happened. This safe is JUST as sturdy, if not more then the other one. I wish I had seen this first. It's about 1/3 of the other ones size, but I don't need a huge one. You just can't beat this. Don't let the low price fool you. It's AWESOME for the price. I was asked to price this after seeing it, I would have guessed 40-50.00.
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: Quick Cash Lock Box
customer_reviews.text: We use this lockbox for temporary cash storage. It works well and has held all of the money from our Fundraiser. Its very sturdy and secure. No worries about people easily breaking it open.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good box, sturdy and secured.
customer_reviews.text: Nice item and good, speedy and professional service. Didn't really want anything beyond this so I'm good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my wife so that she can organize her bills and coins. It also hold and lot of paper bills and coins.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebs

customer_reviews.title: Just SO SO
customer_reviews.text: Item came bent and would not lock correctly...we needed it so tried to bend it back, got it locked, but after a literal bump in the road, I heard change pouring out of it...the lock just wouldn't stay in place....I wish it was just a little better quality...not going to return it because it's just not worth the hassle...but wasn't super thrilled with the quality....
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this little safe it meets all my needs. Has a lot of space to store a lot of money coins and various things.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ohala

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. It’s just really heavy. & it’s a pain that it doesn’t stay closed unless it’s locked which is really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: typically pleased kat

customer_reviews.title: Removed the cash insert (which was sturdy if I would have needed it)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to lock up medications. Removed the cash insert (which was sturdy if I would have needed it). Have used this for a few months and it works well. Easy lock and unlock, sturdy materials, and holds more than I thought it would upon initial opening. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Michele

customer_reviews.title: Well-built and handy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for storing my notary supplies at the office, and it works great. The oversize notary journal fits flat in the bottom, with room for my stamp on top (I removed the coin tray). The box is sturdy, easy to carry with the lid handle, and allows me to lock up my supplies with the small keys provided.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the cash box very quickly and was amazed by the heavy duty construction of the box. I purchased this particular item because I liked the multiple spots for both coins and bills. There is also a large amount of space below the drawer for receipt books over overflow from the drawer. The only thing I don't like about the cash box is the fact that it only closes with the key, there is no normal latch on it. However it does mean that the box is always locked, and the lock is much more secure that those of most varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer  EG

customer_reviews.title: Great for small business
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cashbox! It's incredibly sturdy. It's very solid and has a nice weight to it. The size is adequate for a small business's needs. I can fit two piles of bills (usually ones on one side and fives and tens on the other, has four compartments for coins, and I can fit my receipt book and product packaging under the bill tray. I would definitely recommend this as the price and quality are both very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Not safe when there's change inside.
customer_reviews.text: We used this box to hold all our money after a festival and the lock popped open when it was picked up from the weight of the change. It's okay if you're not using it to hold change (just bills or other light items) but if you're expecting to get a lot of quarters or other change I'd try for something with a more sturdy lock.
customer_reviews.author: Fauxpaws

customer_reviews.title: Not much but great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It definitely wouldn't stop a decently motivated theif but definelty helps to keep things a little more secure and in a organized place. The money tray is decent and underneath it's big enough to hold any standard sized paper documents. This would work great at garage sales and other small sales scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Wish that it had a "snap" shut as the key ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish that it had a "snap" shut as the key does not always grab and you could lose the entire contents of your money box.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Different Lock Box!
customer_reviews.text: The lock boxes work good. I had to send one back because the tray had a crack on it. The other negative is that the tray does not fit securely. I don't use one in the box I put watches in because it gets in the way. I have to use the tray in the other one for checks, etc., even though I still don't care for it much. UPDATE: I gave this smooth one to mother to use. The one I just bought had a rougher material on outside, which I liked, but the box would not lock securely as the first one. Someone could easily pry this one up with a screwdriver!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Starks

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price and Size.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for my documents, etc. As far as I can tell this fits normal page size documents that I put in there. Has a tray for cash, coins, CC's, checks, etc. Really good for the price, it does seem a little flimsy security wise.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Roth

customer_reviews.title: Ok for club sale stuff
customer_reviews.text: Ok for school club sale stuff. But if you are looking for something more valuable, I would say look at other products
customer_reviews.author: Kunal

customer_reviews.title: Could improve
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cash box. I purchased it for my small business. I don't plan on using it much since most people pay by card. I love that its black and that it locks by key. I have a beige cash box at home that locks by combination code and I worry people will learn my code at work. However, this black cash box only has 2 slots for bills. Which means I have to group my large bills and small bills into 2 bundles. My previous box had 4 slots for bills. Maybe I'm spoiled but I wish there were more bill slots. Otherwise, it's a nice easy cash box.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn't close all the way without a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't close all the way without a lot of work to line it back up. Then when you would try to open it, it would stick and be hard to open. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie W

product_meta.title: SentrySafe CB-12 Cash Box with Money Tray and Key Lock 0.21 cu Feet, Black
product_meta.description: The SentrySafe CB-12 Cash Box offers reliable and durable security with solid steel construction and a privacy key lock. A convenient fold-away handle provides easy transportation of your valuables and a removable cash drawer keeps your currency organized. This versatile storage unit is ideal for both home and business needs. Lock Type -Flat Key
feature_bullets: Cash box features a removeable money tray to organize bills, coins, and receipts
Money box is equipped with a key lock to keep the lid closed and money safe
Perfect cash box for farmers markets, festivals, garage sales, fundraisers, and more
Lock box with key is constructed from solid steel with a convenient carrying handle for easy transportation
Exterior: 11.8 in. W x 9.3 in. D x 3.7 in. H; Interior: 11.7 in. W x 9 in. D x 3.4 in. H; medium 0.21 cubic foot capacity; weighs 5 pounds
